short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: First open source web extension Kaspa wallet.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Swap, mint, send, and receive KRC20 tokens directly in the wallet. You keep full custody of your private keys, which never leave your web browser.

Powerful tools made for everyone

- Seamlessly swap KRC20 tokens at low fees.
- Easily mint new KRC20 tokens directly on Ghost Wallet.
- Receive KRC20 tokens from any wallet or exchange.
- Transfer KRC20 tokens to anyone. 
- Monitor all activity with detailed transaction histories.

Best Security

- As a self-custodial wallet, you have full control of your funds. We never have access.
- Private by design. No name, email, or phone number required.
- Our global support team is here for you 24/7 on Discord.
